name: spectral-thief
caption: Spectral Thief

effect.short: Steals the target's stat increases, then inflicts damage.
effect.full: Steals the target's stat increases, then inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic:regular-damage}.  Will not steal stat increases that would put any of the user's stats at more than +6; any excess is left on the target.  Stolen increases are affected by abilities as normal.

flavorText:
The user hides in the target’s shadow, steals
the target’s stat boosts, and then attacks.
